channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Authorities still searching for suspect in shooting of 2 Minnesota state lawmakers
item.description: A massive search is stretching into its second day for a man who authorities say posed as a police officer and fatally shot a Democratic state lawmaker in her suburban Minneapolis home.

item.title: Minnesotaâ€™s slain Democratic leader lived the political divisions in the US every day
Political violence is threaded through recent US history. The motives and justifications vary
